# Troubleshooting

## `Generated outputs are out of date`

Run:

```bash
ai-context build
```

## `Manifest target ... is not generated by scopes`

Check `scopes[].codexTarget` and ensure each non-root manifest target is represented.

## `No project_doc_max_bytes detected`

Add `.codex/config.toml`:

```toml
project_root_markers = [".git"]
project_doc_max_bytes = 65536

[features]
child_agents_md = true
```

## Orphan generated files

Run:

```bash
ai-context build --remove-orphans
```
